SEER ICD-O-3 Histology Code and Behavior

Source: R/fcds-data.R
seer_icd_o_3.Rd

Contains the histology codes and behavior description provided by the ICD-O-3 SEER Site/Histology Validation List.

seer_icd_o_3

Format

A data frame with 12,084 rows and 5 variables:

site_group

integer. Site group, e.g. "Esophagus"

histology

character. Four-digit ICD-O-3 histology code, e.g. "8262"

histology_description

integer. Description of histology, e.g. "Papillary Adenocarcinoma, NOS"

morphology

character. Five-digit ICD-O-3 morphology code, e.g. "8262/3"

morphology_description

integer. Description of morphology, e.g. "Villous Adenocarcinoma"

References

https://seer.cancer.gov/icd-o-3/
